actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

actions.subcommittee: SBA, the General Economy, and Minority Enterprise Development
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on SBA, the General Economy, and Minority Enterprise Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on SBA, the General Economy and Minority Enterprise Development

official_title: To provide eligibility for small business concerns employing socially and economically disadvantaged individuals to participate in Federal procurement programs, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Defines the term "small business concern employing socially and economically disadvantaged individuals" as one in which at least 51 percent of its employees are socially and economically disadvantaged individuals as defined under the Small Business Act.

titles.title: To provide eligibility for small business concerns employing socially and economically disadvantaged individuals to participate in Federal procurement programs, and for other purposes.
